backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and state for files, notes, folders, missions, uploads, and authorization, including storage and access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record documenting removal of automated toast notifications and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing behavior and purpose of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a new draft baseline identical to Live version 114, including validation steps and parity checks.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice detailing restrictions following restoration of Live version 114 and requirements for future modifications.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, cleanup, and offline fallbacks.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist and troubleshooting guide for verifying Chrome PWA installability and related manifest and service worker requirements.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Verification checklist confirming that frontend code fully matches Live version 114 across authentication, UI behavior, components, and styling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up providers, handles intro logic, and renders the home page and upload queue runner.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects and pulse animation.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty placeholder file for a connectivity indicator component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom divider line for UI decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Shows a dialog when a browser blocks opening a file externally, offering retry or download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a file preview with actions like open, download, move, and delete, supporting various file types.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads using workers, speech-to-text, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a floating button that opens the folders view.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen interface for managing folders, including creation, editing, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen viewer for navigating, previewing, sharing, deleting, and organizing files with swipe support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with support for selection, long-press actions, and multiple viewer dialogs. Integrates file/note queries, touch handling, and viewer or external-opening logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a progress bar. Handles sign-out and shows a gallery icon.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen that fades out after 2 seconds. Calls onComplete once the fade-out finishes.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link fails to open, allowing retry or copying the link. Uses toast notifications for feedback.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login button for Internet Identity authentication. Shows a loading spinner while logging in.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail view supporting task editing, autosave, and viewing attached files or notes. Integrates missions queries, autosave logic, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a mission with title and tasks. Handles task addition, removal, and mission submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view. Shows a target icon with hover animations.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission manager that lists missions, handles creation, deletion, filtering, and navigation to mission detail view with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Simple layout wrapper that constrains content to a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving selected files or notes into it with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions to download, share, delete, or send it to a folder or mission.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes into another folder or back to the main collection with performance timing.
Swipeable row component enabling edit and delete actions with drag gestures and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Progress bar displayed during active uploads summarizing upload counts and total progress.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores persisted uploads when the backend actor becomes ready and resumes them with concurrency limits, updating progress and completion state.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays a welcome screen with branding graphics and a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retry logic, identity handling, and admin token support.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks upload batches, progress, and state updates, providing APIs to start and manage file, link, and note uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Triggers a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity is initialized and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch and updates on pointer-type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced mission autosaving with queued updates and state reset when missions change.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to list, fetch, create, and update missions using the backend actor with identity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes with concurrency-limited mutations and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Supplies React Query hooks for files and folders, including fetching and creating items with upload concurrency limiting and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: React hook wrapping Web SpeechRecognition API, handling continuous/interim transcripts, errors, and listen state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and mobile layout defaults.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main authenticated home UI with uploads, gallery, folder/mission views, and optional smoke test runner.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers and constants for classifying actor initialization errors and serializing error details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening URLs externally, downloading, and sharing files or notes.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic determining how files open (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME category.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type and provides helpers for previewability and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, determines completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two Task arrays safely with BigInt taskId handling.
frontend/src/utils/noopToast.ts: Provides a no-op toast API matching Sonner to disable notifications without breaking calls.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements opt-in performance timing utilities with logging and async operation measurement.
Manages a persisted upload queue in IndexedDB, storing file bytes and progress for resumed uploads.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs mission mutation phases in development for React Query debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for core backend flows and formats detailed results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides a concurrency limiter to cap simultaneous async tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and cleanup for routing.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: A Web Worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns them via postMessage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, border radii, animations, and plugins for typography and animations.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for consistency and drift detection.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including schema metadata, an existing feature to disable automated toast messages, and a pending related feature request.
